topics.topic: Tell about a time you performed for a large audience.

levels.level_1: I sang at a school talent show.
levels.level_2: I performed with a band in front of a festival crowd.
levels.level_3: I gave a motivational speech to a hall of university students.

topics.topic: Describe your first job.

levels.level_1: I worked at a local coffee shop as my first job.
levels.level_2: I helped manage backstage at a theater.
levels.level_3: I managed social media for a celebrity.

topics.topic: Name a celebrity you met by chance.

levels.level_1: I met a popular chef at a restaurant by chance.
levels.level_2: I bumped into a famous musician while hiking.
levels.level_3: I once had lunch with a world-famous actor who shared career advice.

topics.topic: List the languages you speak fluently besides your native one.

levels.level_1: I speak conversational Spanish.
levels.level_2: I am fluent in French and can converse with native speakers easily.
levels.level_3: I am fluent in five languages including Mandarin and Russian.

topics.topic: Share an extreme challenge you’ve completed.

levels.level_1: I completed a 10k run.
levels.level_2: I finished a half-marathon with no formal training.
levels.level_3: I completed an ultramarathon through desert terrain.

topics.topic: Describe your most valuable possession.

levels.level_1: My most valuable possession is an old family watch.
levels.level_2: I own a valuable antique vase that has been in my family for generations.
levels.level_3: My most valuable possession is an original Picasso painting.

topics.topic: Explain who you’ve been mistaken for.

levels.level_1: People sometimes mistake me for my cousin.
levels.level_2: People occasionally mistake me for a popular social media influencer.
levels.level_3: People often mistake me for a Hollywood celebrity.

topics.topic: Describe a unique talent or skill you have.

levels.level_1: I can solve a Rubik's cube in under a minute.
levels.level_2: I can juggle five balls at a time without dropping them.
levels.level_3: I can play any song on the piano by ear after hearing it once.

topics.topic: Describe how you saved a life.

levels.level_1: I once rescued a kitten from a busy road.
levels.level_2: I performed CPR on someone who collapsed at a park.
levels.level_3: I once saved someone from drowning while on a remote island.

topics.topic: Share the most dangerous thing you’ve done.

levels.level_1: I went rock climbing on a supervised course.
levels.level_2: I went skydiving on a dare from friends.
levels.level_3: I went BASE jumping off a cliff in a foreign country.

topics.topic: Describe an impressive encounter with a stranger.

levels.level_1: A stranger once paid for my coffee.
levels.level_2: A stranger I met at an airport gave me career advice.
levels.level_3: A stranger on a plane offered me a job at their company.

topics.topic: Talk about a world record or notable achievement you hold.

levels.level_1: I hold a minor record at my high school in track.
levels.level_2: I won first place in a regional poetry competition.
levels.level_3: I hold a world record in a speed-puzzle competition.

topics.topic: Share your experience of surviving a natural disaster.

levels.level_1: I experienced a blackout during a severe storm.
levels.level_2: I experienced a minor earthquake while on vacation.
levels.level_3: I survived a tornado while camping alone in the wilderness.

topics.topic: Describe an unusual place you’ve visited.

levels.level_1: I visited a butterfly sanctuary.
levels.level_2: I explored an abandoned castle during a trip to Europe.
levels.level_3: I explored a sunken shipwreck during a diving trip.

topics.topic: Discuss a major competition you’ve won.

levels.level_1: I won a local trivia competition.
levels.level_2: I led my team to victory in a state-level debate competition.
levels.level_3: I won a national robotics competition at the age of 15.

topics.topic: Share an unbelievable travel experience.

levels.level_1: I saw a wild dolphin during a boat tour.
levels.level_2: I got lost in a jungle while backpacking and found my way out.
levels.level_3: I camped in the Amazon rainforest with only a guide.

topics.topic: Explain where you unexpectedly met a famous person.

levels.level_1: I met a local politician at a public event.
levels.level_2: I met a famous actor at a small café in Europe.
levels.level_3: I had a private dinner with a famous world leader.

topics.topic: Talk about your pets, if you have any.

levels.level_1: I have a pet goldfish named Bubbles.
levels.level_2: I have two pet parrots that mimic my voice.
levels.level_3: I own a pet tiger that I raised from a cub.

topics.topic: State your college major.

levels.level_1: My college major was in psychology.
levels.level_2: My major in college was astrophysics with a minor in philosophy.
levels.level_3: My college major was a triple degree in neuroscience, physics, and art.

topics.topic: Describe an accomplishment you’re proud of.

levels.level_1: I taught myself how to play the guitar.
levels.level_2: I raised $5,000 for a local animal shelter through crowdfunding.
levels.level_3: I created a startup that was featured in Forbes magazine.

topics.topic: Explain your current job title and role.

levels.level_1: I am a customer service representative at a retail store.
levels.level_2: I work as a junior analyst for a well-known tech company.
levels.level_3: I am a top executive at a global tech firm.

topics.topic: State how many countries you’ve traveled to.

levels.level_1: I have traveled to two countries outside my own.
levels.level_2: I have traveled to seven countries across three continents.
levels.level_3: I have traveled to over 30 countries, often on spontaneous trips.

topics.topic: Describe a skill you’ve learned recently.

levels.level_1: I recently learned how to bake sourdough bread.
levels.level_2: I learned how to edit professional-quality videos for YouTube.
levels.level_3: I recently learned how to code an AI system from scratch.
